member.name: T:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.ITerminal
member.summary: Exposes the dependancy properties and events exposed by the terminal control.

member.name: E:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.ITerminal.LineEntered
member.summary: Event fired when the user presses the Enter key.

member.summary: The bound items to the terminal.

member.summary: Bound autocompletion strings to the terminal.

member.name: P:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.ITerminal.Prompt
member.summary: The prompt of the terminal.

member.name: P:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.ITerminal.Line
member.summary: The current editable line of the terminal (bottom line).

member.summary: The display path for the bound items.

member.summary: The error color for the bound items.

member.name: P:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.ITerminal.ItemsMargin
member.summary: The margin around the bound items.

member.name: T:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal
member.summary: A WPF user control which mimics a terminal\console window, you are responsible for the service providing the data for display and processing the entered line when the LineEntered event is raised. The data is bound via the ItemsSource dependency property.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.ItemsSourceProperty
member.summary: The items to be displayed in the terminal window, e.g. an ObservableCollection.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.AutoCompletionsSourceProperty
member.summary: Autocompletion-strings to be traversed in terminal window when tab is pressed, e.g. an ObservableCollection.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.ItemsMarginProperty
member.summary: The margin around the contents of the terminal window, optional field with a default value of 0.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.PromptProperty
member.summary: The terminal prompt to be displayed.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.LineProperty
member.summary: The current the editable line in the terminal, there is only one editable line in the terminal and this is at the bottom of the content.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.ItemDisplayPathProperty
member.summary: The property name of the 'value' to be displayed, optional field which if null then ToString() is called on the bound instance.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.LineColorConverterProperty
member.summary: The color converter for lines.

member.name: F:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.ItemHeightProperty
member.summary: The height of each line in the terminal window, optional field with a default value of 10.

member.name: M:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.OnPreviewKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Processes every key pressed when the control has focus.

member.name: M:Simple.Wpf.Terminal.Terminal.OnStyleChanged(System.Windows.Style,System.Windows.Style)
member.summary: Processes style changes for the terminal.
member.param: The current style applied to the terminal.
The new style to be applied to the terminal.
